weather.description: Get weather information for cities (current conditions and forecasts)

sports.description: Get live scores, standings, and schedules for NFL, NBA, MLB, NHL, Soccer, and F1

stocks.description: Get real-time stock quotes, historical prices, market indices, and cryptocurrency data

fx.description: Convert currencies and get exchange rates (EUR, USD, GBP, JPY, and 30+ currencies)

wikipedia.description: Search Wikipedia and get article summaries, historical events, and random articles

msforms.description: Fetch Microsoft Forms data (questions, responses, aggregated stats) for analysis with pandas. Owner auto-detected from form ID.

browser.description: Web automation - navigate pages, click, type, screenshot using CeSail/Playwright. Browser runs on host, sandbox code controls it via RPC.

countries.description: Get country information - population, capital, region, languages, currencies, and flags

openlibrary.description: Search books and authors, get book details by ISBN, author biographies, and book covers

hackernews.description: Get Hacker News top/new/best stories, user profiles, and search stories via Algolia
